body.name: 2K Light Bulb Security Camera, 2.4G&5Ghz WiFi 360°Security Camera Wireless Outdoor Indoor with LED Light, Motion Detection Tracking, 10X Zoom, Alarm, 2-Way Talk, Color Night Vision, 24/7 Recording
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 6 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 36 mins
features: 💡【Easy to Install/Setup & 2.4G/5G WIFI Connection】 Installing the light bulb security camera is like replacing light bulb, just screw it into a E27 light socket(110V-240V). No drilling, no power cable required. Download “iCam365” App, using the QR code mode to set up the camera quickly. Support both 5GHz & 2.4GHz dual-band WiFi , which is faster and more stable signal to offer smoother images and live video for you.

💡【2K HD Image & Color Night Vision & LED Light】3MP(2304*1296) HD light bulb camera can ensure that you can see clear pictures during the day and night, which is clearer than 1080P. Designed with LED light and built-in 6 IR lamp beads, the outdoor camera for home security offers full-color/infrared/smart night vision. LED light have Always-on Mode(for lighting) and Night-sensing Mode(detect events will on). (Note: Not waterproof, if installed at outdoor, please add a waterproof cover for it ).

💡【360°Coverage & Two-Way Audio & Multiple-user Sharing】 Wireless Security camera support 355°horizontal 180°vertical rotation(privacy mode), 10x digital zoom, which can cover corners you want to monitor and offer all-round protection. Built-in microphone and speaker, the camera allows you to talk to your family or visitors in real time via APP. Support multi-user access, allows multi-person to see live video by sharing the device. Compatible with Android/IOS devices.

💡【Motion Detection Tracking & Real-Time Alert】Equipped with high-sensitivity sensor, home security camera can detect human/pet/car/motion, once detecting the any movement, the camera light bulb will track the moving object automatically and push an alert notification to the phone, and you can set up light or make a sound to scare off intruders, protecting your family and property.

💡【Micro SD Card/Cloud Storage & 24/7 Recording】Light socket security camera support cloud storage (need to pay,7 days for free) or add a TF card (not included, up to 128GB ) to preserve your video, 24/7 recording, playback important moment anytime and anywhere.(Note: if use TF card to store, please insert card into the card slot first, then use the camera)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2K 2.4G/5G Light Bulb Security Camera , A Perfect Christmas Birthday Gifts for yourself/Friends/Parents/Family/Girl Friend! With VERYHDSN upgrade light bulb camera, you don’t worry about property lost and inability of baby, elderly people, pets care! Keep an eye on your home and family safety anytime anywhere! Why Choose Our 2.4G/5G WIFI Bulb Camera for Home Security? Dual Band WIFI Connection: Support 2.4Ghz/5Ghz Dual Band WIFI Connection, much faster and more stable.High Resolution: Supports 2K(2304*1296) resolution, see much clearer image and video at day and night than 1080P.360° PTZ Rotating with Privacy Mode: 350° Pan, 180° Tilt create PTZ all round coverage for your home, rotate vertically to switch to privacy mode when at home.10X Digital Zoom: Enlarge the video to see details clearly. Power Supply: E27 light Socket.24/7 Recording: Recording and storage important event with an TF card(not include, max 128GB) or a cloud service(need to pay,US$59 one year).Real-Time Talk: Use the two-way intercom to communicate with family members, pets, and more. Support multi-user sharing.Smart Detection &Auto Tracking: support motion/car/human/pet/sound detection, motion pan tracking, the camera can automatically track moving objects once an abnormality is detected. Drawing detection area to reduce unnecessary alerts.Real-time Alert: IF detected the moving object, you will receive the message on APP.LED Light Mode: Always-on mode (Can be used for lighting, like a light bulb) and sensor mode(It will light up when an event is detected and turn off automatically when the event ends.)3 Night Vision Modes: IR/full-color/ smart night vision, Max detect up to 15m away.APP control: support remote control on your IOS or Android device. Note: Don’t be waterproof, if the bulb camera is installed at outdoor, we recommend that you add a waterproof cover, it is best to ensure that the rain cover is fully enclosed.

Motion Detection Tracking & Real-time Alert Motion Detection: The security camera can detect human/car/pet and other moving objects.Auto Tracking: It can smartly track the human movement and record it. You can check what happened in your home even when you’re not there.Alarm & Real-time Alert: when detected the human moving, you will receive the notification on APP. You can set the light function or make a sound to scare off intruders. Packing List: 1 * Light Bulb Security Camera1 * E27 Light Holder1 * Screw Pack1 * English Manual

2K HD Image & Three Night Vision Modes This bulb camera provide 2K HD clear image at day and night, much clearer than 1080P. Full Colour Mode: the LED work continuously during the day and night to provide a clearer picture. Infrared Mode: provides standard surveillance during the day and infrared video at night. Automatically switches to infrared mode under low light conditions Smart Mode: provides standard surveillance during the day and the LED light will automatically turn on at night when an event is detected. (Need user to set )

10X Digtial Zoom: Enlarge the image manully to view more details.360° Coverage: Pan 355° tilt 180° rotating range to monitor with no dead angle, when you don’t want to monitor at home, you can rotate the camera 180° vertically to switch to privacy mode. (please check the product video on detail page)Customized Detection Area: Set frequently active areas on the APP to reduce unnecessary alarm notifications.

Multi-user Sharing: The home cameras allows multiple users to access it at the same time, so you can watch the monitored footage with your family.Two-way Audio: With the built-in microphone and speaker, you can talk not only to the mailman but also to your family at any time, without having to face each other.

24/7 Recording and Playback Bulb Camera supports Cloud Serive to storage video (need pay ) and TF card (not included, max 128GB) for local storage, event logging that can be played back at any time without losing essential details.

Please Note Before Use the Outdoor Camera: The WIFI camera 's installation method is to screw into the E27 lamp holder, don't need wire.If use the TF card to storage, please insert it in the card slot first before use the camera, or it will not work, if there is an error reported, please format the memory card.Due to signal problems, real-time picture and video may be delayed somtimes.Pixels can be adjusted from HD to Ultra HD.Motion detection/human tracking function/light Function/alarm need to set by self. the detection sensitivity can set. But If can't detect or tracking, please set the sensitivity to maximum. The message notification function can also be turned on/off.For faster connection, please close to the camera and put the product in place with a strong WI-FI signal for testing.If you cannot connect, reset the probe needle and try connecting again. Only the voice is heard, the camera will reset successfully. or please be free to link us, we will be here to help you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The camera is so cool!
reviews.reviewText: Very useful for me, it can record the moving object, and put notification to my mobile phone. Cloud service need to pay, so i buy a TF cart for the camera, so I can view real time and history. The picture is clear with wide coverage area. The led light also works well.
